channel.title: MOL (My Own Language)!
channel.description:
MOL stands for My Own Language, created by me :D And it is based off no other scripting language and it is extremely easy to script once you get the grasp of it :p. I had created this in Delphi, and i will be adding to it. Right now, i only have about 3 working functions. Read the tutorial for more information (included with MOL) ;)
Download, and suggest ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 01:50:23 am[/size][hr]12 downloads and no comments? C'mon peoples ;)
